newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle not fully established - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle not fully established - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow and virtually non- existent, USDA said. Prices not fully established on slaughter steers or heifers. Buyer interest limited, seller interest light. Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed Basis Delivered. (paid on hot carcass weights).
Slaughter Steers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1225 lbs 102.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1175-1200 lbs 102.00.
Wk To Date - 9,000 Sm Pd Lst Wk- 17,600 Sm Pd Lst Yr- 7,700
